name: FlightFox, Inc.
description: Operator of cloud-based travel management platform intended to offer online travel planning services. The company's cloud-based travel management platform allows to search, book, analyze and report on flights, hotels, cars and handles all changes and cancellations, enabling users to minimize travel complexities.
one_liner: Operator of cloud-based travel management platform intended to offer online travel planning services.
